column4: im trying to remove kubuntu by putting the long command in, but as soon as the terminal finds out that one of the things listed is not installed, it stops the whole process. is there a way around that? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FromUbuntuToKubuntu
or simply remove the name of the package in the list that isn't installed.
then use that line to install all the packages.. then remove them.
